Issue.creator: bstasyszyn
Issue.summary: Add client error handler to the SDK
Issue.description: The client should be notified of errors that occur in any of the services and then be allowed to handle the error. For example, the Discovery Service performs background refreshes and may get an error from the server. if, say, the error is fatal (i.e. retries would be ineffectual) then the client should have the opportunity to recover (for example, by recreating the SDK).
